name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea for a feature or enhancement of an existing feature

---

**What is your feature?**
describe the basic idea

**Which feature (if any) does it extend?**
Try to describe or name what it would extend

**Describe the feature**
Go into more detail of how it should work and what exactly it would do

**Additional context**
Add any more context if needed
